content: The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice is one of the Key Items found within The New West's Pagoda Realm in Black Myth: Wukong. It is unlocked upon defeating a mandatory boss within the Pagoda Realm, but it can be tricky to know what the item is used for at first glance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice is one of the Key Items found within The New West's Pagoda Realm in Black Myth: Wukong. It is unlocked upon defeating a mandatory boss within the Pagoda Realm, but it can be tricky to know what the item is used for at first glance.
